name: PirateShipSounds
0:
”Alexa open pirate ship sounds”
”Alexa ask pirate ship sounds to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pirate ship sounds
des:
Embark on a thrilling auditory adventure with Pirate Ship Sounds! Immerse yourself in the world of swashbuckling pirates with realistic sounds of creaking decks, billowing sails, and distant sea shanties. Whether you're a fan of pirate lore or seeking ambient sounds for relaxation or role-playing games, this app offers a diverse array of high-quality, authentic pirate ship noises. Set sail towards an epic soundscape where the roar of the ocean and the call of seagulls await.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Pirate Ship Sounds
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
